description:
Serving innocent accident victims and their families across Central Florida, Polk County and the greater Tampa metro area from our law office in Lakeland, the attorneys at Neufeld, Kleinberg & Pinkiert, PA, are fully committed to doing whatever we can to increase your chances of obtaining the maximum amount of compensation you deserve for your serious personal injury or wrongful death claim.

Backed by our more than 100 years of combined legal experience, our law firm's attorneys possess the extensive skills and resources necessary to handle your matter efficiently and to improve the likelihood you will obtain the favorable outcome you seek. Over the course of our history, we have secured some of the largest verdicts in the state for personal injury and wrongful death claims, earning our recognition from TopVerdict.com.

Among our other accolades, our attorneys have earned top lawyer rankings from various peer review sources, and we have received "Superb" client ratings on Avvo. In addition, our law firm has enjoyed numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients, and we find great reward in being able to help so many in our communities find the justice they deserve so that they can begin to rebuild their lives.

If you suffered an injury or lost a loved one due to an auto accident or any other type of preventable tragedy caused by someone else, you owe it to yourself and your family to contact Neufeld, Kleinberg & Pinkiert, PA, either by phone or through our law firm's website to schedule a free initial consultation.
